data.text: Fortune karama Hotel, Freddys bar. A small and nice sport bar in the city life. Very easy access as metro walking distance. Look out for suruchi, she has a good hospitality attitude. None the less cant wait to mention tow lovely guys in reception. Madan and Mehtab, great guys with smile and can do attitude.  Always lovely and friendly. love to see them at the reception.
data.title: An evening in Freddie's

data.text:
Good Hotel

On business trip with 7 of us stays at this hotel all good. 

Good is excellent, service too excellent. 
Always recommending to everyone take a chance to stay here 
FO and Housekeeping staff are excellent specially Rajesh and Manpreet Kaur.
data.title: Good Hotel

data.text: Though the rooms are large and spacious...the interior needs upgrade. The furniture is pretty old. The reception wasn't cooperative. The best part was its location to metro station. There is lot of disturbance during night due to dance bars
data.title: Rooms need a makeover

data.text:
I am the regular customer who using this hotel services...
They providing So many Bars and Massage Parlours.
Today January 15th morning 02.45 am I JUST CAME TO VISIT THEIR SOUTH INDIAN DANCE BAR WITH KERALA TRADITIONAL DRESS. UNFORTUNATELY ONE OF THEIR MAIN ENTRANCE'S SECURITY GUARD IS BLOCKED ME AND HE BEHAVED LIKE I AM A BEGGAR. AND HE INSULT ME REGARDING MY TRADITIONAL DRESS, Because he said the reason is UAE Hotel Law is not allowing to enter with a kerala traditional dress.

I Don't know is the UAE Hotel law banned kerala tradional dress or He Don't like me because of my dress code.

When he talked like this nonsens, i just told him its fine and i am going back. After that when i am meeting one of my friend, he just came and said like I WILL ALLOW YOU TO ENTER, JUST GO AND SIT IN THE CORNER OF THAT DANCE BAR.

How he is telling like that, this hotel is serving this with free of cost ???

If there is any dought they can check their CCTV Cameras.

I don't know why this hotel management is hating kerala people this much !!!

Every body knows this hotel condition and what are the activites are going there.
I am not the person to publish their Dirty Activities, but Don't behave like this to anyone.

Thank you for the Bad Morning
data.title: Please Train the staff to respect the customer

data.text: The hotel was wonderful. It was even better than expected. The price was amazing, Beautiful room.Great location near to adcb metro station . We really loved the character of the hotel. The restaurant was fantastic and staff was friendly and helpful.The best stay ever. The environment was pleasant and welcoming. Both check-in and check-out were professionally handled,  Room service was 24/7@Hotel ,especially staff Ms. Shruthi shetty was very supportive and she was very attentive whenever any help/service required. It was great staying there
data.title: Excellent hospitality

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest
Thank you  for taking the time to share your feedback with with us. its a pleasure to serve you.
At Fortune Karama Hotel, we strive to ensure our guest satisfaction and it is always heartwarming to hear that we succeed. i am very glad to hear that our team provided you with a good and satisfying service.
Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.
 Kind Regards,
 Irshad Hussain
General Manager
